Mika Singh To Be Produced Before Court In Dubai Today For Sending Obscene Messages To A 17-Year-Old Brazilian Model
Mika Singh To Be Produced Before Court In Dubai Today For Sending Obscene Messages To A 17-Year-Old Brazilian Model
With the on-going Me Too movement getting stronger in India, this piece of news comes as a shock. In a country, where women are coming out and speaking against their sexual predators especially celebrities, Mika Singh, in the midst of it, reportedly sent indecent pictures to a minor.
Singer Mika Singh was arrested in UAE for allegedly sending "indecent pictures" to a teenaged Brazilian model, according to a media report on Thursday.
Singh, who was here to perform at a party, was arrested in UAE after the model lodged a complaint that the singer has sent her inappropriate pictures, Gulf News reported quoting sources. He also promised her a job in a Bollywood movie, it said.
Twitter
The 'Subah Ho Na De' hitmaker was last seen on stage at a Bollywood awards ceremony followed by a performance at a private party. Singh has sought consular access and the embassy staff is working on his case, Indian Ambassador to the UAE Navdeep Singh Suri was quoted as saying in the report.

“Following efforts by the embassy, singer Mika was released at 11.30 pm. He will be produced before a court today,” ANI reported quoting Indian Ambassador to UAE Navdeep Singh Suri said.
This is not the first time that the singer has been facing charges of inappropriate behaviour.
BCCL
He has been accused of forcibly kissing the Bollywood's controversial actress Rakhi Sawant. Meanwhile, official sources in New Delhi said that Singh was detained at 3 AM and legal proceedings were being initiated against him.
